trans-unit.source: Contains the data sent to a tracking participant by the run-time tracking infrastructure when a <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> is resumed.
trans-unit.target: Contém os dados enviados para um participante controlo a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução quando um <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> é retomada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.BookmarkResumptionRecord"></xref> class using the specified instance ID, record number, bookmark scope, bookmark name and owner.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.BookmarkResumptionRecord"> </xref> classe com o ID de instância especificada, número de registo, âmbito de marcadores, nome de marcador e proprietário.

trans-unit.source: The instance ID of the associated activity.
trans-unit.target: O ID de instância da atividade associada.

trans-unit.source: A sequence that defines the order in which tracking records are generated.
trans-unit.target: Uma sequência que define a ordem em que são gerados os registos de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the associated activity’s <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O ID da atividade associada <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The activity that was waiting for the bookmark to be resumed.
trans-unit.target: A atividade que estava a aguardar o marcador ser retomada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> that is resumed by the workflow execution engine.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> que é retomada, o motor de execução do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> that is referenced by this <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.BookmarkResumptionRecord"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> que é referenciado por esta <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.BookmarkResumptionRecord"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the scope ID of the <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref> that is associated with this bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o ID de âmbito do <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref> que está associado esta marcador.

trans-unit.source: Gets information on the <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo"></xref> object that was waiting for the bookmark to be resumed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém informações o <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo"> </xref> objeto que estava a aguardar o marcador ser retomada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that was supplied when the <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> was resumed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor que foi fornecido quando o <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> foi retomado.

trans-unit.source: The value that was supplied when the <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> was resumed.
trans-unit.target: O valor que foi fornecido quando o <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> foi retomado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that represents the current <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.BookmarkResumptionRecord"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.String>que representa o atual <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.BookmarkResumptionRecord"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.String>
